reviews.text: Each floor has a theme. You can search for clothes, games, comics, music, electronics and more. The bottom floor has some tourist information and souvenirs. Located near other malls and shops.
Really nothing great but the fact that you can go shopping there. Plenty of shops based on technologies and gadgets.

El Triangle Centro Comercial is a shopping centre in the heart of Barcelona. It may not be huge but it houses some really interesting and exciting shops! Many of them are not cheap to shop in, however, the atmosphere is quite good. There are fashion shops, beauty boutiques, accessories shops, shops with a focus on technology, cafes and restaurants and many others. So this centre seems to have it all! It's good for  a day out and if you can afford it you can do some shopping too!
Small shopping centre right in the busy centre of Barcelona. Very busy and not a great selection of shops.

The triangle is a very nice place to find all the kinds of shops in the Barcelona downtown. FNAC department store with books, technology, movies and music and wear, glasses, perfumes shops. All in one place. If you visit Barcelona and want to go shopping, this is your place.

This shopping centre located on the Plaça de Catalunya is very nice but also very small, therefore it doesn't have that many shops. However it does have an Urban Outfitter, a big FNAC (French DVD, CD qnd book retailer) and a Sephora among the other shops! Fair warning, you have to pay for the toilets!
Area but Nice with the puls and all outside places just went around IT in order to visit some stores
The center is located in a Very good location all around area are tourism and shopping area. the shopping center including good shops with good item prices.

The shopping centre was located near our hotel and we walked past it several times a day,  the shops are useful if you need/want to get some clothing, footwear or accessories;  when we first walked inside, we expect a lot more shops considering the building size.

This shopping centre is large but seems to have only 2 anchor tenants. Not sufficient stores to be a commercial centre but ideal for respite from an unpredictable October. There are tons of stores around the centre so don't be shy to venture outside!

This shopping centre is brilliant, got everything you can think of on each floor and at the very top has a restaurant which has absolutely amazing views over the top of barcelona absolutely beautiful!!

I loved shoppin here, they have an entire floor dedicated to make up n perfume! They have floors that are just for food they have everything!!
Loved it

There is the Café Zuric, where many Barcelona's people, from students to other people, are meeting every day in Barcelona's centre. So there is FNAC, where you can buy from books to computers and other multimedia tools. Besides there are opticals and make up stores.
This is one of the few comercial centers of Barcelona that I like. Small, with basically one shop of each kind and with reasonable prices in the very center of Barcelona. Good indeed!

If you are in Barcelona and looking for a good choice of new vinyl or CDs, look no further than the FNAC store in El Triangle Commercial centre right on Placa Catalunya square. Could not find better choice anywhere else in Barca, especially at these prices. Two more floors of photo, electrical and books. As usual.
Excellent shopping mall, where you can find any kinf of store , as FNAC and others, and also an excellent location in Piazza Catalunya where all main popular places of the city are near by
This is the place to go if like me, you love Urban Outfitters, Sephora and Havaianas! Whevener I go to Ramblas, this mall is a must for me!
Not a bad place to buy some interesting stuff and to have a snack or a coffee before continuing exploring around...
It is an "ok" shopping centre. Just a few shops and coffee shops. The only reason I go there is because of Fnac, which is fine. Not the first option in Barcelona in case I want to go shoppping.
The Triangle it is very well located next to Plaza Cataluña. Inside the mall there are many shops such as Massino Duty, a bookstore, Sephora... I like visiting it very much
Mall with variety of shops and products. Good restoration around.Next to the Plaza Catalunya, the heart of the city. Very well connected.

the place is OK but it is definitely not a big mall where you can find anything to suit your needs. Sure it has a great fnac store, Sephora, Massimo Dutti and Camper stores. Add a Starbucks and that is pretty much everything. It does have some other stores but cannot even remember them. Oh yes, a Urban Outfitters. Unfortunately those stores changed from awesome to boring like 10 years ago.

there are few places to eat, it's ok, and the main atractions would be the sephora store and the FNAC, you can spend a hole afternoon looking for books, musics, video games, etc. its nice and usually quiet

In this central shopping centre you there´re one biggest media and bookshop center ( fnac) ,many small restaurants
for brunch or lunch and fashion shops.
I like a lot to spend my time sometimes at El Trinagle, reading books, discovering new movies and music and trying new technology.
In the real town center, you can have a nice shopping experience in this place, cause you really have it all. I do love it!

Commercial mall in the center of Barcelona, ​​very well connected with public parking
Variety stores : FNAC , perfumeries , obtiques , cafes and bars, etc.

Excellent location for the mall. Right on Placa Catalunya. Visited only FNAC on the 2nd floor. Quite big and diversified.
But the only reason im giving it a 5 star is bcoz this mall has a tax free refund service point "Premier Tax Free". You can save a lot of time in the airport by cashing in your refunds and finalizing all the paper work. I executed this process in less 10 minutes. Presented my bills and cashed my refund. The only thing left to do at the airport is to get the customs clearance and deposit the bill in the dropbox.
Moreover, on the other side of the mall theres the "Global Blue" tax free refund service which could also come in handy.
Other than that, I had no time to browse the mall, but it is a must to finish you tax free refunds
Nice place, covers most of the basic needs, and has some great retailers such as Urban Outfitters and FNAC, as well as some nice eateries. :-)
the mall located in the city centre is small but bas some interesting shops suchas massimo dutti and desigual. The good offer is also limited, although good enough for a snack.
A very well conditionates place, plenty of boutiques, places to rest, restaurants...., a good place to buy or simply to walk or just have a look.

In FNAC ground floor there is a hall where there are conferences and a lot of pubs where you can have an afternoon Snack or a drink. There is also a very big bookshop with a lot of newspapers, magazines and books.
There's not a lot here other than a large Fnac store and one or two small shops to the side. The large entrance and sign is very deceiving - don't go out of your way to go here!
